title: The ABS of molecular engines
summary: Peroxisomes are cell organelles that carry out a number of functions, including the degradation of cytotoxins. For this purpose, they require enzymes that have to be transported into peroxisomes via complicated machinery. Scientists have now detected an as-yet unknown transport step, thus gaining a better understanding of life-threatening diseases.
